name: QA Engineer (Optics)
description:
WayRay is not your average startup — we are a vertically integrated deep-tech company leading the world in holographic AR. We are currently looking for deep tech-minded go-getters to join our team of brilliant, ambitious professionals.

As a team, we push ourselves every day to solve the seemingly impossible. Our company culture is unlike any other, and that's why we're #1 in holography. If you like a good challenge, if you're ready to give everything you've got, then we're happy to have you. We can't promise it'll be easy, but we promise you'll have something big to show for it.

We are looking for a QA Optic Engineer. Your key responsibility will be measuring and quality improvement of our holographic products in this role.

Primary tasks

  • Holographic systems optical parameters tests and measurements
  • Testing optoelectronic products
  • Data processing, reports
  • Development of measurement and quality control procedures, acceptance tests
  • Necessary equipment selection
  • Develop own stands and devices, prepare design specifications for related departments.

Requirements

  • Higher education in optics or related fields
  • Work experience in optics 1-3 years
  • Proficiency in CAD (Autodesk or similar) and specialized software (Zemax)
  • Experience and ability to develop/write methods and instructions
  • Ability to design and set up experiments
  • Ability to search for information, apply modern approaches and practices
  • Ability to process research results, mastery of statistic tools
  • Experience with laboratory optical equipment
  • Ability and willingness to on-hands work
  • English at the upper-intermediate level

And do not hesitate to apply if you are

  • Comfortable with changes
  • Brilliant in creating something new
  • A reliable, trustworthy, and supportive team player
  • Passionate about technology and innovation

What we offer

  • Opportunity to work in a game-changing company shoulder to shoulder with the best professionals from all over the world
  • Transparency and openness on all levels
  • Immersion in the Deep Tech culture where we give birth to real innovations
  • Benefits package including educational opportunities and stock option plan for all positions and grades
  • Competitive salary and bonus for outstanding results
  • Yearly big party and regular corporate events
